If a transformation matrix \\( A \\) is applied to \\( z(t) \\) at some time \\( t_0 \\), altering it to \\( z(t) = A e^{i\omega t} \\), will the Fourier Transform \\( \mathcal{F}(z(t)) \\) be independent of the matrix \\( A \\)?
